#include <matrix.h>


Data Fields

double * v

Detailed Description

vector structure.

The vector format is :
<---- clm --->
[ 10 20 30 ]
Defined the structure of the vector type based on a dynamic allocation.

Parameters:
m content of vector
clm number of column in matrix
